Title: Relates to not requiring prior authorization for certain cancer treatments
Summary: Relates to not requiring a prior authorization determination for certain categories of cancer treatments based on National Comprehensive Cancer Network Guidelines.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-b & 4325, Ins L; amd §4406-c, Pub Health L; amd §364-j, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, the public health law and the social services law, in relation to not requiring prior authorization for certain cancer treatments
